description:
Kisaki Kiriha, as a Six Blade Priestess, specializes in dealing with supernatural creatures and disasters. She`s a beautiful girl with long black hair and cold looking eyes. She wears a black school uniform and stockings.
Richel Carle is her double pronged spear that can copy the abilities of others. Kiriha has copied the abilities of http://anidb.net/ch61115 [Sayaka]`s Koukarin allowing her to form protective barriers. http://anidb.net/ch83831 [Yume]`s mind control ability had also been copied which allowed Kiriha to control Sayaka.
Source: Strike the Blood Wiki
name: Kisaki Kiriha
